title: Sanskriti - Mapping Cultural Narratives
desc: Sanskriti is a revolutionised platform which aims to bridge the gap between people from different cultures and helps create awareness around others' cultures. This web application involves use of Gamified Elements for better engagement and token & badge system for more enriching experience. To connect the with the Gen-Z's, it incorporates a social sharing tab where users can create posts and like others' posts. A chatbot is also provided to assist about the culture and traditions. An interactive map on the homescreen redirects to the states unique cultures page.
features: Audio(TTS) Visual components for better understanding
Social Sharing to spread awareness and excitement

title: Vitalis - Healthcare Platform
desc: Vitalis is a decentralized healthcare platform, fostering transparency between doctors and patients, giving patients greater control over their healthcare data. Smart contracts are the backbone of Vitalis, automating critical processes and ensuring security, transparency, and decentralization. They eliminate the need for intermediaries, reducing operational inefficiencies and costs.

title: RFID-Direct (Ecommerce) - Frontend
desc: RFID-Direct is an E-commerce website which is designed for the sale of RFID products which involves diverse items like RFID Enabled Smart Locker, Smart Doors and Inventory Management Reader. This is a frontend website which offers a variety of components including product page, cart, checkout and payment gateway brought by RazorPay.

title: Snakes & Ladder - [Freelance Project]
desc: I have developed a gamification website for clients from the Agile - JIRA and SCRUM team. This gamification involves snakes and ladder game with a slight twist. As soon as the peg arrives at a snake head or at the base of the ladder, a question modal pops up which displays and MCQ. The snake bites the player only if he gives an incorrect answer and the ladder takes the player higher only if he gives a correct answer.

title: Daily Dispatch - Latest News
desc: A news website which renders latest news from the NewsAPI and displays it category wise based on different genre in a card format using the concept of react component reusability. Each card has a Read Now button redirecting to the main article.

title: Expense Tracker
desc: A simple react application which tracks your expenses providing features like add income and expenditure along with remarks. The data appends to a history of transactions.

title: CodeHelp </>
desc: An educational platform for beginners to get their hand wet into web development. This website offers a variety of features such as dedicated tutorials with code and example for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, C++ and Java. Along with this, there is a Pomodoro Timer, a note taking page, a to do list page and faqs etc.
